name: feed2toot
description: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) automatically parses rss feeds, identifies new posts and posts them on the Mastodon social network.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.
Limit number of RSS entries published at each execution.

volumes.description: Local path for feed2toot config files.

readme-vars.project_blurb: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) automatically parses rss feeds, identifies new posts and posts them on the Mastodon social network.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Local path for feed2toot config files.

opt_param_env_vars.desc: Limit number of RSS entries published at each execution.

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
Run `docker run --rm -it -w /config -v /path/to/data:/config -e PUID=1000 -e PGID=1000 lscr.io/linuxserver/feed2toot /usr/bin/register_feed2toot_app` to generate credential files (be sure to set the correct volume path and PUID/PGID values).

Edit the feed2toot.ini in /config to configure your instance name and RSS feeds.

See the [feed2toot docs](https://feed2toot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) for more information.

setup:

Edit the feed2toot.ini in /config to configure your instance name and RSS feeds.

See the [feed2toot docs](https://feed2toot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) for more information.
